title: Circular recycling concept for silver recovery from photovoltaic cells in Ethaline deep eutectic solvent
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29174-29183
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05135A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Charly Lemoine, Yann Petit, Thomas Karaman, Gøril Jahrsengene, Ana Maria Martinez, Anass Benayad, Emmanuel Billy
Metallic silver is directly recovered from photovoltaic cells by leaching and electrodeposition in Ethaline deep eutectic solvent associated with a redox shuttle that can be regenerated to start a new cycle.
